Title: Market Research and Validation
Description: Conduct thorough market research, identify target audience, and validate business idea through customer interviews and surveys.

Title: Business Plan Development
Description: Create a comprehensive business plan including financial projections, marketing strategy, and competitive analysis.

Title: Legal Entity Formation
Description: Register the company, obtain necessary licenses, and set up legal structure with proper documentation and agreements.

Title: MVP Development
Description: Build and launch a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) to test core features and gather initial user feedback.

Title: Funding Strategy
Description: Develop funding strategy, prepare pitch deck, and identify potential investors or funding sources.

Title: Team Building
Description: Recruit core team members, establish roles and responsibilities, and create company culture guidelines.

Title: Marketing and Branding
Description: Develop brand identity, create marketing materials, and establish online presence through website and social media.

Title: Financial Setup
Description: Set up accounting systems, open business bank accounts, and establish financial tracking and reporting processes.
